test.name: SecretMMS.TC.021
test.description: Validate "Secret MMS" Use Case does not function when Sender&Recipient are in DB & Sender has "Secret MMS" feature disabled & Sender has already defined a proper Recipient password Test Category: SHOULD Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- 1. Sender and Recipient both are provision in application 2. Sender has "Secret MMS" feature disabled. 3. Sender has defined a proper Recipient password. 4. Send Secret MM1 Message to MMS Proxy 5. MMS Proxy should intercept this message and send Request to Application as HTTPS GET Request. 6. Application checks whether Sender and Recipient are registered for the Application Features or not. ---------------------------------------------------------------
